response.overview: In a school obsessed with clean records, a single violation triggers a quiet chain reaction. Ordered to expose seven offenders, a model student becomes an unwilling investigatorâ€”documenting sins that never look like sins, committed by people no one would ever suspect.  As the list nears completion, the line between justice and manipulation collapses. What remains is a system where guilt is curated, truth is disposable, and silence is the most effective weapon of all.
response.tagline: In a school obsessed with clean records, the dirtiest crime is the truth that never makes a sound.
response.title: CHEESE!
